actions.name: Magician

cost.trigger: The user hits a creature with a Special-Category Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits a creature with a Special-Category Attack.

Effect: The user steals one equipped Accessory or Belt slot item from the triggering target. The user must have an empty equipment slot to use this Ability.
